EmailTemplate.name: 201908_BK_Webinar_TruTrak_Integration_and_Onboarding_MC.201908_BK_Webinar_TruTra
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder to join us for today’s webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> WEBINARTruTrak Integration and Onboarding
Date: Today September 4th, 2019 Time: 9 AM MDT
Join us answer questions and discuss the integration of TruTrak into BendixKing’s product line and how that will affect your business moving forward.
Andrew Barker, Vice President of Americas Aftermarket and Experimental Sales, and Lamonte Macon, Channel Manager, will walk you through the BendixKing dealer agreements, how to start buying new products immediately, what the future integration of TruTrak will look like and basic milestone timing.
REGISTER HERE <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_taf-RCOdS1aHpkNx4dLuzw]]>
